original_text: People in Judea must then run away to the hills to hide. People that are inside the city must leave it. People that are outside in the fields must not go back into the city.
korean_text: 그 때에 유대에 있는 자들은 산으로 도망갈 것이며 성내에 있는 자들은 나갈 것이며 촌에 있는 자들은 그리로 들어가지 말지어다

sentences.original_text: People in Judea must then run away
sentences.korean_translation: 유대에 있는 사람들은 그때 도망가야 한다

sentences.original_text: People that are inside the city
People that are outside in the fields
must not go back into the city
